original_text: Now the city was large and spacious, but there were few people in it, and the houses had not yet been rebuilt.
korean_text: 그 성읍은 광대하고 그 주민은 적으며 가옥은 미처 건축하지 못하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: Now the city was large and spacious
but there were few people in it
and the houses had not yet been rebuilt
